Package controller

Class ProductScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ProductScreen
  • public class ProductScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller for the product add/modify screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProductScreen

        public ProductScreen()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializes the scene components. This includes setting the label placeholder text and updating the screen title based on the Function enum (ADD_PRODUCT or MODIFY_PRODUCT) set by the main screen controller. It also includes binding the all parts table view and associated parts table view to their respective ObservableList datasets. It also includes a call to a method to fill in the product details in the text fields if the screen function is modifying a product.

      • setProductScreenFunction

        public static void setProductScreenFunction​(ProductScreen.Function function)
        Sets the function of the screen (ADD_PRODUCT or MODIFY_PRODUCT).
        Parameters:
        function - A Function enum describing the function of the screen. The enum constant can be either ADD_PRODUCT or MODIFY_PART.

      • setProduct

        public static void setProduct​(Product product)
        Updates the product screen controller's private static Product variable to reference the Product object to be modified.
        Parameters:
        product - The Product object reference passed to the controller.
